net.derquinse.common.io
Class DurableFiles

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.common.base.NotInstantiable
      net.derquinse.common.io.DurableFiles

@Beta
public final class DurableFiles
extends NotInstantiable

Provides utility methods for working with durable files. All method parameters must be non-null unless documented otherwise.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

Method Summary

          Appends a character sequence (such as a string) to a file using the given character set.

copy

public static void copy(InputSupplier<? extends InputStream> from,
                        File to)
                 throws IOException
Copies to a file all bytes from an InputStream supplied by a factory. The file is sync'd before being closed.

Parameters:
from - the input factory
to - the destination file
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs

copy

public static <R extends Readable & Closeable> void copy(InputSupplier<R> from,
                                                        File to,
                                                        Charset charset)
                 throws IOException
Copies to a file all characters from a Readable and Closeable object supplied by a factory, using the given character set. The file is sync'd before being closed.

Parameters:
from - the readable supplier
to - the destination file
charset - the character set used when writing the file
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs

Writes a character sequence (such as a string) to a file using the given character set. The file is sync'd before being closed.

to - the destination file
charset - the character set used when writing the file
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs
